str2: A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Genitive Masculine Singular

str2: Gen: in behalf of; acc: above.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Name, character, fame, reputation. From a presumed derivative of the base of ginosko; a 'name'.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: (a) I receive, get, (b) I take, lay hold of.
From chairo; graciousness, of manner or act.
Commission, duty of apostle, apostleship. From apostello; commission, i.e. apostolate.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Probably from etho; a race, i.e. A tribe; specially, a foreign one.
Obedience, submissiveness, compliance. From hupakouo; attentive hearkening, i.e. compliance or submission.
Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.
